import React from "react"; import { useParams } from "react-router"; import PropTypes from 'prop-types'; import { useDispatch } from "react-redux"; import { addcart, addorder } from '../actions' function Payment({products}) { const { price } = useParams() let totalprice = 0 if(products!=null){ for(let i = 0;i { products.forEach(element => { }); } return (
Address
Items
{products.map((data)=>(
{data.name}

{data.description}

{data.price} THB
x {data.quantity}
))}
Total : {totalprice}
); } Payment.propTypes = { products: PropTypes.array.isRequired }; export default Payment
